name: Parachute Game
description:
This is a game about parachute  flying. Nothing more, nothing less. 

Explore the island archipelago, look for mysterious landmarks and land on the marked places. Oh, and also you will need to find plane tickets to this all.

This game was made for Mix and Game Jam (2019). Theme: Dimension Change.  I tried to recreate 3d parachute flying mechanic from games like PUBG in 2D.
